archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.2.3c: c) incorporate relevant event attributes in event entries (e.g. IP address, username, time and date, protocol used, port accessed, method of connection and name of device)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
